recipesJson.name: RYNGZ (Froot, Cereal, Milk)
recipesJson.author: oddDrop
recipesJson.description:
RYNGZ: starring Froot, Sweetened Multi-Grain Cereal, and Milk.
Meet the lucky friend of unlucky. To me this is the closest to real froot loops and milk with no power of pine sol. This is as to date as close as I could get to authenticity. Kids havent tested it and your mother probably does not approve.
No substitutions, just mix it up as is and enjoy!
Ingredients: 
Cap Fruit Circles: Froot Type Blend Flavor
Tpa Meringue/OOO CMU: Milk
Fw Sweetener: Sugar
-oddDrop

reviews.text: If you are as tired of cereal vapes as I was then definitely give this a mix. The new SilverLine fruit circles is amazing. No pledge or off notes like all the others. Thereâ€™s a very nice balance here with loops to cream. 3 days in is great but also off the shake. Great job my friend!
Mixed with no substitutions with 3 day steep. taste like fruit loops with sweet milk should get even better over time
